牨字的基本解释

牨
gāng
水牛。
古同“犅”，公牛。

牨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gāng］
［《廣韻》古郎切，平唐，見。］
(1)水牛。
(2)同“犅”。公牛。

牨字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　牨； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页699第03
【廣韻】古郞切【集韻】居郞切，?音岡。【玉篇】水牛。又【集韻】本作犅。特牛也。通作剛。○按《廣韻》牨，從《玉篇》訓水牛。犅，從《說文》訓特牛。分二義。《集韻》合爲一，當以《廣韻》爲正。

牨字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
牨字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
牨
gāng
buffalo.
Gu Tong "X", the bull.
牨
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gāng］
["Guangyun" Gu Langqie, Ping Tang, see you. ]
(1) Buffalo.
(2) Same as "X". bull.
牨
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Cow Character Department] 　牨; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 699 03
[Guangyun] Gu Yinqie [Jiyun] Ju Yinqie,? Yingang. [Jade articles] Buffalo. Also 【Jiyun】This is a B. Special cattle also. Tong Zuogang. ○Train the buffalo from "Yu Pian" by pressing "Guang Yun". B, from the "Said Wen" training special cattle. Two meanings. "Ji Yun" is combined into one, and "Guang Yun" should be taken as the positive.
